properties.Name: PartyInterest

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: InterestId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Interest.

Columns.Name: Date
Columns.Description: The date that the associated information is reported, recorded or effective as-of.

Columns.Name: AioLevelId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an AIO Level.

Columns.Name: PartyInterestNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information related to the Interest that the Individual has acknowledged or reports.

Properties.Description:
The Interest(s) that a specific Individual  has acknowledged was identified or recorded as of the indicated date.

Note:
For information of this type it makes most sense to simply record it as a 'date'  rather than a 'period start date/period end date', which would have very limited practical value.

Interests tell us what the customer is interested in.    

Interests are the quickest way capturing the customer.

What interests the customer is what captures his imagination or ability to expend time with the business if it caters to these interests.

Activities, Interests and Opinions are the foundation of Psychographics and Psychographic Segmentation.     

Activities, Interests and Opinions equate to 'lifestyle'.    Activities, Interests and Opinions (AIO) are the basis for understanding consumer buying behavior as a function of their lifestyle.

Interests describe what a consumer 'is interested in', such as family, home and community.

Each organization will identify, define and track a specific set of AIO's to gather information about, define consumers and make decisions. 

Ex:  

Interest =  "Professional Basketball"
Interest Type = "Sports"

Interest =  "Gardening"
Interest Type = " Home Interests"

Interest =  "Investing"
Interest Type = "Finance"

Sales, marketing and advertising activities are often planned for or targeted at groups having or reporting specific interests.
